GSD.description:
loop: Check for overflow while configuring loop

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.257 by commit 2035c770bfdbcc82bd52e05871a7c82db9529e0f. For more details please see the references link.
